price: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Lalle ne Kai, wanda Ka shigar a cikin wuta to, haƙĩƙa, Ka tozarta shi kuma bãbu wasu mataimaka ga Azzãlumai.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ مَن تُدۡخِلِ ٱلنَّارَ فَقَدۡ أَخۡزَيۡتَهُۥۖ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ أَنصَارٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka man tud'khili al-nāra faqad akhzaytahu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
